title: Bought wrong item from store?!?!?!?!?
body:
So I boight 20$ worth of RP. I was going to use that to buy a bunch of mega orbs. Well at the bottom of tye store they had some bundles for good and great orbs. For some reason I thoight one of those bundles was for mega orbs and I bought one. I instantly realized my mistake. 
I have sent in a support ticket but with it being so late I don't expect a reply in a while. I was just wondering anyones opinion on the chances if me being refunded so I can use the RP I pirchased for my intended purchase. 

Also note that once I realized my mistake I have NOT opened a single orb from that bundle. 
I'm just stressed because I don't have a lot of money to throw at stuff like this and now I feel like I just threw 20 bucks put the window because I do not want this good orb bundle. I wanted to just buy as many mega orbs as I could.

replies.body: As long as the orbs haven't been opened at all, we should be able to set this right ^_^! Reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and let them know what happened, just make sure not to open those orbs yet!
